welcome_message_body: Welcome to Shanghai, the bustling metropolis known for its blend of modernity and traditional charm. Get ready to explore the city's iconic skyline, rich history, and vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay and make the most of your time in this incredible city!

restaurants.name: Polux by Paul Pairet
restaurants.description: Polux by Paul Pairet is a french restaurant located in Huangpu.
restaurants.address: Lane 181 Taicang Rd | 太仓路181弄 (5 Xintiandi N | 新天地北里5号), Huangpu, 上海市

restaurants.name: Hai Di Lao (海底捞火锅)
restaurants.description: Hai Di Lao (海底捞火锅) is a hotpot restaurant located in Huangpu.
restaurants.address: 南京东路830号，500号第一百货5楼B馆 (西藏路), Huangpu, 上海市

restaurants.name: Goodfellas
restaurants.description: Goodfellas is a italian restaurant located in Huangpu.
restaurants.address: 7 Yan'an E Rd | 延安东路7号, Huangpu, 上海市

restaurants.name: Three on the Bund
restaurants.description: Three on the Bund is a restaurant located in Huangpu.
restaurants.address: 3 E Zhongshan 1st Rd (at Guangdong Rd), Huangpu, 上海市, 200002

restaurants.name: Lost Heaven Yunnan Restaurant (花马天堂云南餐厅)
restaurants.description: Lost Heaven Yunnan Restaurant (花马天堂云南餐厅) is a yunnan restaurant located in Huangpu.
restaurants.address: 17a Yan'an E Rd, Huangpu, 上海市, 200002

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal of Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the network 'SHA Free WiFi'.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Shanghai Pudong International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 3 hours per day.
